Package org.jerkar.api.utils

Contains Jerkar utility classes (meaning classes holding only static helper methods).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JkFileFilters  
JkUtilsAssert  
JkUtilsFile Utility class for dealing with files.
JkUtilsIO Utility class for dealing with Inputs/Outputs.
JkUtilsIO.StreamGobbler Runs a thread copying all data from a stream to a specified writer.
JkUtilsIO.StreamGobbler.InnerRunnable  
JkUtilsIterable  
JkUtilsJdk  
JkUtilsObject Utility class for dealing with generic Object class instances.
JkUtilsReflect Utility class for dealing with reflection
JkUtilsString Utility class for dealing with strings.
JkUtilsSystem Utility class to deal with the underlying system.
JKUtilsTests  
JkUtilsThrowable Utility class to deal with Throwable
JkUtilsTime Utility class to deal with time.
 

Package org.jerkar.api.utils Description

Contains Jerkar utility classes (meaning classes holding only static helper methods). These classes have been created to avoid dependency on Guava or Jakarta-commons.
